p: After digestion, iTRAQ113-119 was used to separately label the serum and urine of stage Ia1-IV, and iTRAQ121 was used to label the serum and urine of the normal control group. For iTRAQ-8plex labeling, 150 μL isopropanol was added to each labeling reagent, and the mixture was added to each polypeptide sample (100 μg) after shaking and mixing. The reaction was carried out at room temperature for 2 hours. Then, water (100 μL) was added to terminate the reaction, and samples were freeze-dried after mixing.
